00023     RunManager::RunManager() {
00024         pluginManager_ = new PluginManager();
00025         pluginMessenger_ = new PluginMessenger(pluginManager_);
00026         pwMessenger_ = new ParallelWorldMessenger(this);
00027     }
00028 
00029     RunManager::~RunManager() {
00030         delete pluginManager_;
00031         delete pluginMessenger_;
00032     }
00033 
00034     void RunManager::InitializePhysics() {
00035 
00036         G4VUserPhysicsList* thePhysicsList = new FTFP_BERT;
00037         G4VModularPhysicsList* modularPhysicsList = dynamic_cast<G4VModularPhysicsList*>(thePhysicsList);
00038 
00039         if (isPWEnabled_) {
00040             std::cout << "[ RunManager ]: Parallel worlds physics list has been registered." << std::endl;
00041             modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(new G4ParallelWorldPhysics("ldmxParallelWorld"));
00042         }
00043 
00044         modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(new APrimePhysics);
00045         modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(new GammaPhysics);
00046         //modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(new TungstenIonPhysics);
00047 
00048         if (BiasingMessenger::isBiasingEnabled()) {
00049 
00050             std::cout << "[ RunManager ]: Enabling biasing of particle type " << BiasingMessenger::getParticleType() << std::endl;
00051 
00052             // Instantiate the constructor used when biasing
00053             G4GenericBiasingPhysics* biasingPhysics = new G4GenericBiasingPhysics();
00054 
00055             // Specify what particles are being biased
00056             biasingPhysics->Bias(BiasingMessenger::getParticleType());
00057 
00058             // Register the physics constructor to the physics list:
00059             modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(biasingPhysics);
00060         }
00061 
00062         SetUserInitialization(thePhysicsList);
00063 
00064         G4RunManager::InitializePhysics();
00065     }
00066 
00067     void RunManager::Initialize() {
00068         
00069         
00070         // The parallel world needs to be registered before the mass world is
00071         // constructed i.e. before G4RunManager::Initialize() is called. 
00072         if (isPWEnabled_) {
00073             std::cout << "[ RunManager ]: Parallel worlds have been enabled." << std::endl;
00074 
00075             G4GDMLParser* pwParser = new G4GDMLParser();
00076             pwParser->Read(parallelWorldPath_);
00077             this->getDetectorConstruction()->RegisterParallelWorld(new ParallelWorld(pwParser, "ldmxParallelWorld"));
00078         }
00079 
00080         G4RunManager::Initialize();
00081 
00082         PrimaryGeneratorAction* primaryGeneratorAction = new PrimaryGeneratorAction;
00083         SetUserAction(primaryGeneratorAction);
00084         new PrimaryGeneratorMessenger(primaryGeneratorAction);
00085 
00086         UserRunAction* runAction = new UserRunAction;
00087         UserEventAction* eventAction = new UserEventAction;
00088         UserTrackingAction* trackingAction = new UserTrackingAction;
00089         SteppingAction* steppingAction = new SteppingAction;
00090         UserStackingAction* stackingAction = new UserStackingAction;
00091 
00092         runAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00093         eventAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00094         trackingAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00095         steppingAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00096         stackingAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00097         primaryGeneratorAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00098 
00099         SetUserAction(runAction);
00100         SetUserAction(eventAction);
00101         SetUserAction(trackingAction);
00102         SetUserAction(steppingAction);
00103         SetUserAction(stackingAction);
00104 
00105         RootPersistencyManager* rootIO = new RootPersistencyManager();
00106         new RootPersistencyMessenger(rootIO);
00107     }
00108 
00109 }
